pullRequest.body:
Add one implication of portmanteau theorem: a Borel set limit condition implies a closed set limsup condition.

---

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: add the portmanteau implication from Borel set limit condition to closed set limsup condition

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Results about convergence of measures of sets assuming convergence of indicator functions.
